attributes.action: The NHS should remain free to nationals and taxpayers - a referendum on funding please.
attributes.additional_details:
A referendum is required on the level of funding that the population of the UK is prepared to bear for the care of people within the NHS and social care.
The UK has a low percentage GDP expenditure on both health and social provision compared to other similar north European economies.
The populace should be offered a referendum on the appropriate degree of funding for their provision in illness and old age.
